## Options.criticalOptions property

Critical CSS options

Signature:

```typescript
criticalOptions?: {
        src?: string;
        html?: string;
        base?: string;
        width?: number;
        height?: number;
        extract?: boolean;
        ignore?: {
            atrule: string[];
            rule: RegExp[];
            decl: (node: any, value: any) => boolean;
        };
    };
```
